definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Specially designed computer-controlled system, facillitating the operation.
sentences.chinese: 採用獨創的微電腦控制系統，操作簡便。

sentences.english: The total design of the modularized Air-cooled heat pump micro-computer controller .
sentences.chinese: 模塊化風冷熱泵冷水機組微電腦控制器總體設計。

sentences.english: Micro-controlled system with film detection ensures high precision in sealing.
sentences.chinese: 微電腦全自動追蹤封口，膠膜定點，確保封膜準確。

sentences.english: Microcomputer control, with the oil temperature exorbitant alarm system.
sentences.chinese: 微電腦控制，設有油溫過高報警系統。

sentences.english: Something is wrong with this microcomputer.
Contolled by microcomputer , displayed by LED , stepless variable speed .
sentences.chinese: 採用微電腦控制，LED顯示，無級調速。

sentences.english: Three-D motion is controlled by computer to operate automatically.
sentences.chinese: 該機三維運動均由微電腦控制，全自動化工作。

sentences.english: The Microcomputer Lab is for students, faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 該微電腦實驗室是給學生和教職員工使用的。

sentences.english: Water system by microcomputer intelligent control, automatic recording.
sentences.chinese: 採用微電腦系統智能控制，自動記錄用水。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a new temperature controller with micro-computer for medical refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種新型醫用冷藏箱微電腦溫度控制器。

sentences.english: Installing microcomputer counter, easy production managed.
sentences.chinese: 配微電腦計數據，便於廠務管理。

sentences.english: All actio y the microcomputer PLC control, continuous automatic.
sentences.chinese: 所有動作由微電腦PLC控制，連續自動。

sentences.english: Micro-computer control system, Multi specialized channels…
sentences.chinese: 微電腦控制系統，多組特定通道。

sentences.english: If I had a mini-computer on hand, I would certainly let you use it.
sentences.chinese: 如果我現在手頭有一臺微電腦，我肯定會借給你使用。

sentences.english: 1978, ADC developed micro-computer chip and automatic programming system .
sentences.chinese: 1978年，公司開發微電腦芯片和自動編程系統。
